short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a right-click context menu item to copy selected texts as-slug on a web page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Browser Extension to copy a selected text as-slug on a web page. On right-click, the extension will add Copy as-slug context menu item if there is a selection on the page.
